activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11669
activity.text:
@rithviknishad 
This issue happening because of following reason I found:
- The current CSS media query in index.css is only applying when the actual print dialog is opened, not during preview.
-  The `ZoomProvider` and `ZoomTransform` components might be interfering with the print preview.

I will be adding required css and fixing the Zoom provider 
end date: 3/april

Kidly assign. I will raise the PR.
